variables.name: mAnimator
variables.comment: A value animator used to animate the magnifier.

variables.name: mMagnifierIsShowing
variables.comment: Whether the magnifier is currently visible.

variables.name: mAnimationStartX
variables.comment: The coordinates of the magnifier when the currently running animation started.

variables.name: mAnimationCurrentX
variables.comment: The coordinates of the magnifier in the latest animation frame.

variables.name: mLastX
variables.comment: The latest coordinates the motion animator was asked to #show() the magnifier at.

methods.name: private void show(final float x, final float y)
methods.comment:
* Shows the magnifier at a new position.
         * If the y coordinate is different from the previous y coordinate
         * (probably corresponding to a line jump in the text), a short
         * animation is added to the jump.

methods.name: private void update()
methods.comment: * Updates the content of the magnifier.

methods.name: private void dismiss()
methods.comment: * Dismisses the magnifier, or does nothing if it is already dismissed.

methodNames: private void show(final float x, final float y)
